mapper.sql: p.id, p.businessmen_id AS businessmenId, b.merchant_name AS businessName, p.product_name AS productName, p.original_price AS originalPrice, p.discounted_price AS discountedPrice, p.in_stock AS inStock, p.sold, p.title, p.description, p.detail_img AS detailImg, p.product_img AS productImg, p.is_promotion AS isPromotion, p.is_season AS isSeason, p.category_id AS categoryId, p.create_time AS createDate, c.category_name AS categoryName, d.name AS typeName, p.type_id AS typeId, p.del_flag AS delFlag, p.is_shelves AS isShelves
LEFT JOIN ft_business b ON b.id = p.businessmen_id LEFT JOIN ft_category c ON c.id = p.category_id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary d ON d.id = p.type_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = b.user_id
mapper.select:
